channel.title: CVE Feed for DD-WRT -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for DD-WRT -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-27631|2024-08-03T05:32:59.790Z -- dd-wrt -- dd-wrt
item.description: A memory corruption vulnerability exists in the httpd unescape functionality of DD-WRT Revision 32270 - Revision 48599. A specially-crafted HTTP request can lead to memory corruption. An attacker can send a network request to trigger this vulnerability.
